item.title: AI is all you need
item.description: There’s no escaping the buzz around AI(artificial intelligence) these days. And yet, it’s hardly a couple of years before the pandemic, that Big Tech was relying heavily on human-input to fine-tune their models, something that used to be called the last mile problem of AI. e.g. Amazon was using its infamous Mechanical Turk to crowdsource cheap human labor for tasks like verifying AI inputs or labeling data.

item.title: The Data Mesh Approach
item.description:
With rapid advance in the technology world, it makes sense sometimes to rethink our objective and outline the roadmap instead of just following the new and shiny. Data Mesh might seem a relatively new concept, however what its creator Zhamak Dehghani has done is spell out in words the approach required to reach the strategic goal of being a data-driven organization.
